pandoratradingsolutions.ru API¶

API.ptsapi.get_ticker_name(ticker)¶

Get ticker full name from site

Parameters

ticker – short ticker name string, like ‘GAZP’

Returns

full name str

API.ptsapi.gettickerid(ticker)¶

Get ticker id from site

Parameters

ticker – short ticker name string, like ‘GAZP’

Returns

id int
